```{r, message=F}
library( odbc )
library( RMySQL )
```

#### Establishing a connection to a MySQL database

```{r}
# establish connection
con <- dbConnect(MySQL(), user='root', password='FunLasts4Ever!', dbname='movie_ratings', host='127.0.0.1')
```

#### List Tables
```{r}
dbListTables( con )
```

#### Create table in R from the MySQL table

```{r}
myQuery <- 'SELECT * FROM FB_friend_ratings;'
ratings_df <- dbGetQuery( con, myQuery )
ratings_df
```
